title: Ford's Shanks on EPS and Launch of New Super Duty Truck (Audio)
itunes:title: Ford's Shanks on EPS and Launch of New Super Duty Truck (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Bob Shanks, CFO of Ford Motor Co., on 2Q earnings, the upcoming launch of their new super duty truck, and Ford credit.
